name: QrPngPaletteOptions
summary: Palette options for multi-color QR module rendering.

properties.name: Colors
properties.summary: Gets or sets the palette colors (required).

properties.name: Mode
properties.summary: Gets or sets the palette selection mode.

properties.name: Seed
properties.summary: Gets or sets the random seed used by CodeGlyphX.Rendering.Png.QrPngPaletteMode.Random.

properties.name: RingSize
properties.summary: Gets or sets the ring thickness in modules for CodeGlyphX.Rendering.Png.QrPngPaletteMode.Rings.

properties.name: ApplyToEyes
properties.summary: When false, finder (eye) modules keep the foreground color.
